text: John Nolan (born May 22, 1938) is a British movie and television actor who is known for his role as a Wayne Enterprises board member Douglas Fredericks in Batman Begins and The Dark Knight Rises. He was born in London, England and is married to Kim Hartman since 1975. He has two sons and a daughter. He is the uncle to Christopher Nolan and Jonathan Nolan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Christopher Nolan Category:Actors from London
title: John Nolan (actor)
